Free online signature maker. Sign word documents.

How to Sign Word Document using {1}
Click inside the file drop area to upload file or drag & drop file.
From dropdown, please choose one of the options i.e. Drawing, Text or Image.

If you opt for Drawing, please draw your signature. You can also choose the drawing color. If you opt for Text, please add your signature text inside the textbox. If you opt for Image, please upload your signature image.
Select your "Save as" type or leave it as default.
Click "SIGN DOCUMENT" button to eSign your document.
Upload your document, select signature type and click on “SIGN DOCUMENT” button. You will get the download link as soon as the file is signed
